Cringlers.VarietyCrops_SweetPotato.Name: Cringlers.VarietyCrops_SweetPotato
Cringlers.VarietyCrops_SweetPotato.Description: A crop similar to the vanilla potato.

Cringlers.VarietyCrops_DragonFruit.Name: Cringlers.VarietyCrops_DragonFruit
Cringlers.VarietyCrops_DragonFruit.Description: A ripe tropical fruit grown from a cactus-like plant

Cringlers.VarietyCrops_SweetPotatoSeeds.Name: Cringlers.VarietyCrops_SweetPotatoSeeds
Cringlers.VarietyCrops_SweetPotatoSeeds.Description: Plant these in spring. Takes 7 days to fully grow a sweet potato.

Cringlers.VarietyCrops_DragonFruitSeeds.Name: Cringlers.VarietyCrops_DragonFruitSeeds
Cringlers.VarietyCrops_DragonFruitSeeds.Description: Plant these in warm weather. Takes 10 days to mature, and keeps producing fruit after that.

Cringlers.VarietyCrops_CandiedSweetPotat.Name: Cringlers.VarietyCrops_CandiedSweetPotato
Cringlers.VarietyCrops_CandiedSweetPotat.Description: A sweet potato that has been coated in sugar and baked.

Cringlers.VarietyCrops_SweetPotatoFries.Name: Cringlers.VarietyCrops_SweetPotatoFries
Cringlers.VarietyCrops_SweetPotatoFries.Description: Thin and crispy fries made from sweet potatoes.

Cringlers.VarietyCrops_BakedSweetPotato.Name: Cringlers.VarietyCrops_BakedSweetPotato
Cringlers.VarietyCrops_BakedSweetPotato.Description: A perfectly baked sweet potato topped with cheese and spring onions.
